metadata.description: Dark Horse is bloody thrilled to present the most terrifying team-up of talent to hit the comics scene in years, as fan-favorite horror scribe Steve Niles (30 Days of Night, Dark Days) joins artist Kelley Jones (Deadman, Batman, The Hammer) to bring you the follow-up to the hit miniseries Criminal Macabre. Last Train to Deadsville takes supernatural private dick Cal McDonald and his ghoulish partner Mo'Lock on their weirdest adventure yet, when a teenage, mullet-wearing weirdo from suburbia takes his occult fantasies a littleokay, a lottoo far. And Ozzy thought his train was crazy!
metadata.name: Criminal Macabre: The Cal McDonald Casebook
